entity.name: `<Fragment>`
entity.description: `<Fragment>`, often used via `<>...</>` syntax, lets you group elements without a wrapper node.
entity.descriptionClean: Fragment, often used via .../ syntax, lets you group elements without a wrapper node.
entity.descriptionHtml: <Fragment>, often used via <>...</> syntax, lets you group elements without a wrapper node.

entity.name: `memo`
entity.description: `memo` lets you skip re-rendering a component when its props are unchanged.
entity.descriptionClean: memo lets you skip re-rendering a component when its props are unchanged.
entity.descriptionHtml: memo lets you skip re-rendering a component when its props are unchanged.

example.codeHighlighted: const MemoizedComponent = memo(SomeComponent, arePropsEqual?)

resources.title: A (Mostly) Complete Guide to React Rendering Behavior

entity.name: `<Profiler>`
entity.description: `<Profiler>` lets you measure rendering performance of a React tree programmatically.
entity.descriptionClean: Profiler lets you measure rendering performance of a React tree programmatically.
entity.descriptionHtml: <Profiler> lets you measure rendering performance of a React tree programmatically.

entity.name: `<StrictMode>`
entity.description: `<StrictMode>` lets you find common bugs in your components early during development.
entity.descriptionClean: StrictMode lets you find common bugs in your components early during development.
entity.descriptionHtml: <StrictMode> lets you find common bugs in your components early during development.

entity.name: `act`
entity.description: `act` is a test helper to apply pending React updates before making assertions.
entity.descriptionClean: act is a test helper to apply pending React updates before making assertions.
entity.descriptionHtml: act is a test helper to apply pending React updates before making assertions.

entity.name: `useCallback`
entity.description: `useCallback` is a React Hook that lets you cache a function definition between re-renders.

entity.descriptionHtml: useCallback is a React Hook that lets you cache a function definition between re-renders.

entity.name: `useContext`
entity.description: `useContext` is a React Hook that lets you read and subscribe to context from your component.

entity.descriptionHtml: useContext is a React Hook that lets you read and subscribe to context from your component.

example.codeHighlighted: const value = useContext(SomeContext)

entity.name: `useDeferredValue`
entity.description: `useDeferredValue` is a React Hook that lets you defer updating a part of the UI.

entity.name: `useEffect`

entity.name: `useId`

entity.name: `useMemo`

entity.descriptionHtml: useMemo is a React Hook that lets you cache the result of a calculation between re-renders.

entity.name: `useRef`

entity.name: `useActionState` (formerly `useFormState`)
